properties.name: Matterhorn
properties.description: Iconic pyramid-shaped peak (4,478m), Switzerland's most photographed mountain

properties.name: Jungfraujoch - Top of Europe
properties.description: Europe's highest railway station (3,463m) with views of Aletsch Glacier

properties.name: Lauterbrunnen Valley
properties.description: Valley of 72 waterfalls with dramatic cliffs and Alpine scenery

properties.name: Rhine Falls
properties.description: Europe's largest waterfall by volume with 44m drop

properties.name: Lake Lucerne & Chapel Bridge
properties.description: Stunning lake surrounded by mountains with iconic covered wooden bridge

properties.name: Mount Pilatus
properties.description: Reached by world's steepest cogwheel railway with panoramic Alpine views

properties.name: Chateau de Chillon
properties.description: Medieval island castle on Lake Geneva

properties.name: Bern Old Town
properties.description: UNESCO medieval city with Zytglogge clock tower
